message: I think this is a fair split. Take it or leave it.
This offer accounts for a fair split with consideration for you taking the risk of further inflation by rejecting my offer.
Inflation is hitting us hard. This offer is still better for you than what you offered last round considering I have the inflation penalty. Let's end this and get some money!
Let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit before inflation eats away at more of the value.
